author: enridaga
msg: Fixed the way components are loaded from the bundle context.
Removed useless (and wrong) local instantiation of components when not found in he context.

Fixed the way the Classify() resource n the reasoners/web module prepare the rules to compute. This metod strangely did the convertion to the jena model and then back to the owlapi model. This was odd.
